long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Watermelon Drop is not just another casual game; it's a test of precision and foresight. The gameplay is straightforward yet addictive: players use the mouse to navigate a selection of fruits and vegetables, positioning them to drop into a steadily filling cup. The twist comes when two identical items meetâ€”they merge into a larger, more valuable version of themselves.

This merging mechanic is where strategy plays a crucial role. You must think several moves ahead, considering both the space available in your cup and the next items in line to drop. The goal is to create the largest and most valuable food items possible, all while keeping an eye on the ever-present risk of overflowing your cup. Once it overflows, the game ends, and your performance is rated. 

If you have any questions about our Watermelon Drop Unblocked game extension or just want to give us some feedback, feel free to send us a message or write a review! We'd love to hear from you. You can mouse over to Support tab on the extension, then click on "visit the developer's support site" to contact us.

If you wish to remove this extension, follow this steps:
1. Click the 3-dot icon at the top-right corner of your screen.
2. Hover your mouse on More tools then click Extensions.
3. Find the Watermelon Drop Unblocked game extension.
4. Press "Remove"
